Name: Manalith
About the game: Explore a surreal and mystical island as you search for the ancient Manaliths. Discover beautiful vistas, secret passages, and dozens of items. Walk, run, climb, swim, and glide through meadows, woods, jungles, and caverns. Forge your own path, exploring the island however you wish. Use your magic to summon mystical torches to light your way, sense nearby items, blast through secret walls, and fast-travel across the island. Collect items that extend your stamina, improve your magical abilities, and more. Wander and explore at your own pace, without dodging traps, fighting enemies, or scrounging for questionable foods.
